ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: From: David Lendrum  Decisions aplenty...I am a level 27 bard and I can t figure out which weapons to use. I have a barbed leather whip,
ygData.messageBody:
From: David Lendrum <Karnek@...>


Decisions aplenty...I am a level 27 bard and I can't figure out which weapons to use. I have a barbed leather whip, dragoon dirk, demon claws, polished granite tomahawk, and screaming mace.

By the numbers:

BLW: 7/28 - .25
PGT: 6/26 - .23 (Agilitly loss due to proc really hurts this as well)
DC: 5/19 - .26
DD: 6/23 - .26
SM: 8/35 - .22

I'd end up wielding the Demon Claws with the Dragoon Dirk... Now I just wish you were on Tarew Marr so I could buy your whip.

-TopFlite
Fendryl Istalindir, HalfElven Minstrel of Tarrew Marr
